title: UX/UI Discussion
content: It's time we take a step back from the overwhelming push for UX/UI first design. It's gottent out of control

title: Best Methods to learn Coding
content: Taking a look at some of the options. A full fledged degree vs. a coding bootcamp. Open discussion on your background and if you think it was the correct approach.

title: Back-End Dev
content: When I started out, I thought the front end would be more interesting and easier to learn as it could be more easily visualized, but I'm now enjoying the back-end development quite a bit.
